Title: Enacts the quiet hour public spaces inclusion act
Summary: Enacts the "quiet hour public spaces inclusion act"; provides that every covered public building shall offer designated quiet hours during normal business hours; defines "quiet hours" as accommodations made for individuals with autism, post-traumatic stress disorder, sensory processing disorders and other related conditions during a designated time including reduced lighting, lower noise levels and limited use of loudspeakers and announcements.
LawCode: Add ยง148, Pub Bldg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public buildings law, in relation to enacting the "quiet hour public spaces inclusion act"
